alert.note: Alert for Morgan; Rhea; Roane (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 2:55PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN MORGAN...NORTHEASTERN RHEA AND CENTRAL ROANE COUNTIES THROUGH 445 PM EDT... At 355 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Rockwood, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Oak Ridge, Kingston, Rockwood, Wartburg, Midtown, Harriman, Oakdale, Bradbury, Pine Orchard, and Dearmond. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
